name:
DRAGON BALL Z: Extreme
Butoden Update
formal_name:
DRAGON BALL Z: Extreme
Butoden Update Ver. 1.1.0
description: This is an update for DRAGON BALL Z: Extreme Butoden. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of DRAGON BALL Z: Extreme Butoden.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
